title: Lime Fruit Salad in a Mold
directions: In a large bowl, dissolve the gelatin in the boiling water. Whisk in the cold water and set aside to cool slightly.
Rinse a 1-quart mold in cold water. Stir the pineapple, cherries, grapes and pears into the gelatin and pour into prepared mold. Refrigerate until set, at least four hours.
ingredients: 1 (3 ounce) package lime flavored Jell-O mix
1/2 cup pitted dark sweet cherries, drained
